com.googlecode.flickrjandroid.groups
Class Throttle

java.lang.Object
  com.googlecode.flickrjandroid.groups.Throttle

public class Throttle
extends Object

Throttle - Limit the abilitiy to add Photos to a group on a per user per post basis. "No more than X in Y days".

Version:
$Id: Throttle.java,v 1.3 2009/07/12 22:43:07 x-mago Exp $
Author:
Anthony Eden
